DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate compare clinical performance two toric contact lenses amongst 110 subject , 2-week , single mask ( subject ) , daily wear , randomize , bilateral , crossover study ; 4 week duration . Hypotheses include equal good performance test lens control lenses comfort , vision , toric fit characteristic well corneal integrity

DOC.detailed_description: Up 7 site US participate . Each investigator test control lens type . There maximum 6 schedule visit : Visit 1 : Habitual lens evaluation / Baseline / Trial fit Visit 2 : Dispensing ( combine Visit 1 possible ) , Visit 3 : Questionnaire ( exam ) 7 day ( ±2 ) dispensing , Visit 4 : 2 week follow-up 14 day ( ±3 ) dispensing , dispense second lens type , Visit 5 : Questionnaire ( exam ) 7 day ( ±2 ) 2nd lens dispense , Visit 6 : 2 week follow-up 14 day ( ±3 ) 2nd lens dispense
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be least 18 less equal 45 year age , need vision correction wear contact lens BOTH eye ( monovision uniocular fit NOT allow ) . 2 . Be able read J1 near WITHOUT aid near addition distance prescription . 3 . Be currently successful wearer least 3 month B & L SofLens 66 Toric hydrogel lens . 4 . Be able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol . 5 . Agree wear contact lenses eye daily wear schedule least 8 hour per day every day study . 6 . Have distance spectacle spherical component 1.00 D 5.25 D cylinder range 0.75 D 2.25 D cylinder axis within 10 ° vertical within 30° horizontal eye ( subject 's prescription present minus cylinder form ) . 7 . Have best correct manifest refraction visual acuity least 20/25 good eye . 8 . Be good general health , base his/her knowledge . 9 . Must give explanation study objective , lens solution usage requirement visit schedule . The subject must read , indicate understanding agree begin participation clinical study . The subject must sign Informed Consent Form presence Investigator designee . 1 . Presbyopic need near add reading . 2 . Previous refractive surgery ; current previous orthokeratology treatment . 3 . Aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . 4 . The presence ocular systemic disease need medication ( ocular systemic ) might interfere contact lens wear would cause lens remove twice day . ( e.g. , Sjögren 's syndrome , type II diabetes , allergy ) . 5 . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity . ) 6 . Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) . 7 . A history recurrent erosion , corneal infiltrates corneal ulcer fungal infection . 8 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality ; inflammation infection eye , eyelid , associate structure . 9 . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 1mm limbus History giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) bad Grade 2 Meibomian gland dysfunction , blepharitis , seborrhoeic dermatitis 10 . Current pregnancy lactation ( best subject 's knowledge ) . 11 . Actively participate another clinical study time study .
